name: Useless Biology Trivia Quiz | Sci / Tech | 5 Questions

questions.text: What is the scientific name for the forepaw of a cat?
questions.explanation:
manus.

	Pes is the hindpaw, and pfote is the word paw in German.

questions.text: How many bones does a hand contain?
Medically speaking, what is the meaning of the abbreviation SOB?
Which of the following symptoms is NOT common with meningitis?
What is the name of the organ that stores bile?
questions.explanation:
gallbladder.

	The pancreas produces insulin. The liver produces bile, which is stored in the gallbladder.
